SELECT /* COGBoardMapper.selectBoardList */ SEQ , LANG_CD , TITL , CNTS , TYPE_CD , YEAR , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD_ID = 'BOARD_TYPE_CD' AND CD = A.TYPE_CD) AS TYPE_NM , FILE_SEQ , READ_CNT , POST_STRT_DTM , POST_END_DTM , ODTM_YN , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM , REG_IP , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NM , MOD_IP , MOD_DTM , MAIN_YN FROM CO_BOARD_MST A WHERE 1=1 AND LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TYPE_CD = #{typeCd}
AND REG_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND MOD_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND REG_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND MOD_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND (
MAIN_YN = #{mainYn}
)
AND TITL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')
AND CONCAT((SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID), '(', REG_ID,')') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')
AND CONCAT((SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID), '(', MOD_ID,')') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')
AND YEAR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')
AND ( (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR TITL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR CNTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') )
ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC
SELECT /* COGCntsMapper.getBoardListCnt */ count(*) FROM CO_BOARD_MST WHERE TYPE_CD = #{typeCd}

SELECT /* COGBoardMapper.selectBoardDtl */ SEQ , LANG_CD , TITL , CNTS , TYPE_CD , YEAR , FILE_SEQ , READ_CNT , POST_STRT_DTM , POST_END_DTM , ODTM_YN , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM , REG_IP , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NM , MOD_IP , MOD_DTM , THUMB_FILE_ID , MAIN_YN FROM CO_BOARD_MST A WHERE SEQ = #{detailsKey}
SELECT /* COSeqMapper.selectSeqNum */ NEXT_ID FROM CO_SEQ_MST WHERE TABLE_NM = #{tableNm}
